Text: Hey there, 3Dazz.....does this section have the John Lennon "Imagine" segment?
@PattieLennon, the John Lennon segment will be in Part 2. Be up soon.

Thanks 3Dazz

One question, where did you record it from? Presumably not the BBC, or you would have no ads to remove.
Silly question, of course, it's in 3D, so it cannot be the BBC.

@ Froglet, it was recorded from a TV channel called 93D which was only broadcasting for a few hours a day in Australia. The channel stopped transmission as soon as the Closing Ceremony was broadcast. They claim they were getting it from the British broadcaster.
Anyone know what happened to the other Closing Ceremony torrents? There were like a half dozen of them and they've all disappeared, these are the only ones up.
nevermind just search for London instead of Olympics
